MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Chester,. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 3:16AM. Our control centre will attempt to rest the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:05AM on 28 April 2021.
